name: MajorDepression
title: Major Depression
description: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains concepts that represent major depression.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use the Quality Data Model (QDM) category related to Diagnosis. ),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes only relevant concepts associated with diagnosis of major depression including mild, moderate, and severe depression; maternal depression; and depression with and without psychotic features. This is a grouping of ICD-10-CM and SNOMED CT codes.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes depression in remission.)
